resources.string: Unable to load the page. Please check your internet connection and try again.

Zephyr is a weather application designed for users to access accurate and real-time weather updates. Built as a duo project, it integrates features like location-based weather reports, search functionality, favorite weather locations, and weather-related news tailored for the Philippines via PAGASA. Zephyr combines functionality with simplicity, offering an intuitive interface powered by OpenWeatherAPI.
